column4: Ubuntu 10.04 32-bit [Errno 5] Input/output error during installation. CD burnt at 8x [md5sum checked]. I didn't find any solution in ubuntu forums :( Installation stops at 28%
use lili to make ubuntu iso bootable
http://www.linuxliveusb.com/en/using-lili.html  download ubuntu use lili to put it on flash usb or cd dvd etc
